long_description: Built for enduring endeavors, the Vasque Mantra 2.0 hiking shoes supply all-day comfort and lasting performance for demanding day hikes, fastpacking and more. Nubuck leather uppers offer durability, flexibility and natural water resistance; abrasion-resistant nylon mesh provides breathability for added comfort. Vasque Perpetuum last offers a versatile platform that excels in all-day use; straight shape and broad toe box accommodate low-arched feet and natural forefoot expansion. Padded cuffs and tongues provide comfort on the go; heel loops aid entry. Quick-drying nylon linings wick moisture away from feet for enhanced comfort; removable dual-density EVA footbeds add cushioning underfoot. Polyurethane midsoles deliver all-day cushioning and excellent stability; thermoplastic urethane shanks offer support and rigidity for a stable ride over changing terrain. Lightweight Vibram(R) Nuasi rubber outsoles on the Vasque Mantra 2.0 hiking shoes feature a versatile tread pattern for all-terrain performance.
short_description: Built for enduring endeavors, the Vasque Mantra 2.0 hiking shoes supply all-day comfort and lasting performance for demanding day hikes, fastpacking and more.
